##Intended Learning objectives
### Explain why someone may want to use git
### Understand the difference between a git commit, pull and push
### Be able to demonstrate how to initialise a new repository using rstudio and github
### Explain why someone may want to use packrat
### Be able to demonstrate the basic usages of packrat
